metadata.Title: CVE-2022-22824 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: defineAttribute in xmlparse.c in Expat (aka libexpat) before 2.4.3 has aninteger overflow.

criterions.comment: expat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
